title: Birth of the Prophet Muhammad PBUH
commentary: He was named by his grandfather 'Abdul-Muttalib

title: Circumcision
commentary: His grandfather circumcised him on his seventh day as was the custom

title: Nursed by Thuyebah
commentary: Thuyebah was the first wet nurse of PBUH

title: Nursed by Haleema As-Sa'diyah
commentary: She was supposed to return him after 2 years but she requested that
PBUH stays with her longer due to all the blessings she was
witenessing. He stayed with her until he was 4 or 5 years old.

title: Gabriel cleans PBUH  heart.
commentary: Gabriel came down and cleaned PBUH heart

title: PBUH returned to his mother.
commentary: After the episode with Gabriel, Haleema was worried and decided to
return PBUH with whom he stayed until he was 6.

title: PBUH's mother passed away.
commentary: The PBUH's mother, Amina, passed away from sever illness in Abwa on the road

title: PBUH's grandfather takes care of him.
commentary: 'Abdul-Muttalib, the grandfather of PBUH, took care of him in Makkah
